text: Leon "Leo" Jogiches (German: Leo Jogiches; Russian: Лев "Лео" Йогихес; 17 July 1867 – 10 March 1919), also commonly known by the party name Jan Tyszka, was a Marxist revolutionary. Jogiches was a founder of the political party known as The Social Democracy of the Kingdom of Poland in 1893 and a key figure in the underground Spartacus League in Germany. ==References== Category:1867 births Category:1919 deaths Category:Politicians from Berlin
title: Leo Jogiches
